name: Sugar Pie Mafia
description:
Sugar Pie Mafia is a physics-based destruction game where you use different ingredients to bake pies that give them different qualities and throw them at enemies of the mafia, destroying the structures they're in.

Instructions:
At the start of each level, buy ingredients and bake pies using major and minor ingredients. YOU MUST HAVE HAVE A MAIN INGREDIENT FOR EACH PIE.  Make sure you don't use too many ingredients!Then, transition to the level and start throwing!

CONTROLS
Move Mouse and click to aim and throw pies
Spacebar to activate abilities

INGREDIENTS
Sugar: Increases power
Eggs: Increases damage
Flour: Shows further trajectory path

Apple: Activate to rapidly drop straight down
Pumpkin: Activate to massively increase speed
Cherry: Activate to split into three smaller pies
Custard: Explodes on impact.
